Package org.pipservices4.container.build

Class DefaultContainerFactory

java.lang.Object
org.pipservices4.components.build.CompositeFactory
org.pipservices4.container.build.DefaultContainerFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.pipservices4.components.build.IFactory
public class DefaultContainerFactory extends org.pipservices4.components.build.CompositeFactory
Creates default container components (loggers, counters, caches, locks, etc.) by their descriptors.
